name: Gates Of Nowhere
description: Gates Of Nowhere is a Fantasy/Horror adventure for Vive & Oculus.You play as Lother, a Seeker, who is looking for the lost knowledge of the Alchemists. You'll be projected in a huge fantasy dungeon filled with dangerous creatures. You must find the way out revealing at the end the mystery behind your journey.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 970 or Similar DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE HEADSET IS REQUIRED
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 or higher Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE HEADSET IS REQUIRED
